raw_response: {"answer_index": 3, "answer_text": "Left renal vein", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "The left adrenal vein typically drains into the left renal vein. This is a well-established anatomical fact. In contrast, the right adrenal vein drains directly into the inferior vena cava.
